repositories.name: private-app-example
repositories.description: A sophisticated enterprise application with advanced features
repositories.readme:
# Private App Example

## Overview

This is a comprehensive enterprise application built with modern web technologies.

## Features

- **Real-time Analytics**: Live data visualization and monitoring
- **User Management**: Advanced role-based access control
- **API Integration**: Seamless third-party service integration
- **Responsive Design**: Optimized for all devices

## Tech Stack

- **Frontend**: Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- **Backend**: Node.js, Express
- **Database**: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM
- **Authentication**: NextAuth.js
- **Deployment**: Vercel

## Architecture

The application follows a microservices architecture with:
- Separate services for authentication, data processing, and analytics
- Redis for caching
- WebSocket connections for real-time updates

## Performance

- Lighthouse score: 98/100
- Core Web Vitals: All green
- Average load time: < 2 seconds

## Security

- End-to-end encryption
- OWASP Top 10 compliance
- Regular security audits

## Screenshots

### Dashboard
![Dashboard](/screenshots/app-dashboard.png)

### Analytics
![Analytics](/screenshots/app-analytics.png)

## Demo

Check out the live demo at [demo.example-app.com](https://demo.example-app.com)

---

*Note: This is a private repository. The source code is not publicly available.*
